Name: ExternalId
Description: Application source identifier (Unique Id per record) for troubleshooting purpose

Name: CenterCode
Description: This will be provided by OneRehab team before onboarding.

Name: NRIC/FIN
Rule:
Either FIN or NRIC
Only NRIC/FIN which starts with the following prefix values:
S,F,T,G,M
Description: Validation will be enforced NRIC & FIN submitted, based on MHA algorithm checksum.

Name: IdentificationType
Rule:
Allowed values:

SP, //Singapore Pink
SB, //Singapore Blue
F, //Foreigner
NA //Not Available

Name: Race
Rule:
For all races that doesn’t fall within the allowed values, please specify as ‘O’

Allowed values:

C, //Chinese
M, //Malay
I, //Indian
O, //Others

[All other race values from NGEMR will be mapped to Others]

Name: EmploymentStatus
Rule:
For all EmploymentStatus that doesn’t fall within the allowed values, please specify as ‘O’

Allowed values:

E, //Employed
U, //Unemployed
SE, //Self-employed
H, //Homemaker
R, //Retiree
O //Others

[Employed (Full Time, Part Time,)
Unemployed (Not Employed)
Self-employed (Self Employed)
Homemaker
Retiree (Retired)
Others (One Active Miltary Duty, Student - Full Time, Student Part Time, Unknown)]

Values in bracket are from NGEMR
Description: Patient's Employment status prior to this episode

Name: LiftLandingFlight
Rule:
If LiftLanding option is ‘No’

Allowed values: 

1 //OneFlight
2 //TwoFlights
3 //ThreeFlights
4 //Others
Description: Patient’s residence lift landing flight count

Name: LiftLandingFlightOthersComments
Rule:
If LiftLandingFlight option is ‘4’

Max 254 characters
Description: Patient's residence lift landing flight count comments

Name: PresenceOfSteps
Rule:
Allowed values:
True,// Yes
False// No

Name: LocationOfSteps
Rule:
If PresenceOfSteps option is ‘True’

Allowed values (Multiple):
OME, //Outside Main Entry
OT, //Outside Toilet
O //Others

Name: LocationOfStepsComments
Rule:
If LocationOfSteps option is ‘O’

Max 254 characters
Description: Patient’s residence location of steps comments

Name: NumberOfStepsOutsideMainEntry
Rule:
If LocationOfSteps contains ‘OME’

Note: Integer cannot be lesser than 1 and cannot consist of characters/ strings
Description: Patient’s residence number of steps outside main entry count

Name: NumberOfStepsOutsideToilet
Rule:
If LocationOfSteps contains ‘OT’ 

Note: Integer cannot be lesser than 1 and cannot consist of characters/ strings
Description: Patient’s residence number of steps outside toilet count

Name: NumberOfStepsOtherLocation
Rule:
If LocationOfSteps contains ‘O’ 

Note: Integer cannot be lesser than 1 and cannot consist of characters/ strings
Description: Patient’s residence number of steps other location

Name: Kerb/Threshold
Description: Patient’s residence presence of Kerb or Threshold

Name: ReferralSourceSetting
Rule:
Allowed values:

AHI //Acute Hospital-Inpatient
ED //Acute Hospital - Emergency Department
SOC // Acute Hospital - Specialist Outpatient Clinic
CHI //Community Hospital - Inpatient
RDCSCCAAH // Day Rehab Centre/Senior Care Centre/Active Ageing Hub
PC //Polyclinic
GP //GP
NH //Nursing Home
SAC // Senior Activity Centre
WISR //Walk-in/Self-referral
OTHER // Other. Please Specify;

Name: ReferralSourceSettingOther
Rule:
If ReferralSourceSetting option is OTHER’

Max 254 characters

Name: PremorbidBADLStatus
Rule:
Allowed values (Multiple):

IIBADLS // Independent in BADLs 
NAIBADLS // Needs Assistance In BADLs 
DIBADLS //Dependent In BADLs 
O// Other

Name: PremorbidIADLStatus
Rule:
Allowed values (Multiple):

IIIADLS // Independent In IADLs
NAIIADLS //Needs Assistance In IADLS
O //Other

Name: PremorbidMobilityStatusComm
Rule:
Allowed values: 
WI //Walk independently 
WA //Walk assisted
WID //Walk independently; does not use PMA 
WIIM //Walk independently; independent with PMA
WAD //Walk assisted; does not use PMA 
WAI //Walk assisted; independent with PMA 
WANA //Walk assisted; needs assistance with PMA 
NIP //Not able to walk; independent with PMA 
NAP // Not able to walk; assisted with PMA 
B //Bedbound
O //Others
H //Homebound
Description: Patient's Premorbit mobility status in community

Name: PremorbidUseOfMobilityAid
Rule:
If PremorbidMobilityStatusComm is ‘H’ then this is EMPTY 

Allowed values (Multiple): 
If ‘N//None’ is selected then other values will not be allowed.

N //None
U //Umbrella
WS //Walking Stick
NBQS //Narrow base Quad Stick
BBQS //Broad base Quad Stick
C //Crutches
WF //Walking Frame
RF //Rollator Frame
WC //Wheelchair
MW //Motorised wheelchair
MS //Motorised scooter
O //Others
Description: Patient's Premorbid use of mobility aids in the community

Name: PremorbidMobilityStatusHome
Rule:
Allowed values: 

WI //Walk independently 
WA //Walk assisted 
NIP //Not able to walk; independent with PMA 
NAP //Not able to walk; assisted with PMA 
B //Bedbound 
O //Others
Description: Patient's premorbid mobility status at home

Name: PremorbidMobilityAidsHome
Rule:
If PremorbidMobilityStatusHome is ‘B’ then THIS IS EMPTY

Allowed values (Multiple):
If ‘N//None’ is selected then other values will not be allowed.

N //None
F //Furniture walk
U //Umbrella
WS //Walking Stick
NBQS //Narrow base Quad Stick
BBQS //Broad base Quad Stick
C //Crutches
WF //Walking Frame
RF //Rollator Frame
WC //Wheelchair
MW //Motorised wheelchair
MS //Motorised scooter
O //Others
Description: Premorbid use of mobility aids at home

Name: Address
Description:
Patient’s address 
Block Number, Street Name, Floor Number, Unit Number, Building Name (if applicable)

Name: RDGPrimaryOther
Rule:
To be provided if RDG code is “17”

Max 500 characters
Description: Patient primary RDG Other Rehabilitation Diagnosis

Name: RDGPrimaryFrailty
Rule:
To be provided only if RDGSecondary1 is "DECON63"

Allowed Values:
CFS //Clinical Frailty Scale, 
FI //Frailty Index, 
FFC //Fried Frailty Criteria, 
O //Other
Description: Patient primary RDG What method was used to diagnose frailty?

Name: RDGSecondaryOther1
Rule:
To be provided if RDG code is “17”, 

Max 500 characters
Description: Patient secondary RDG Other Rehabilitation Diagnosis

Name: RDGSecondaryFrailty1
Rule:
To be provided only if RDGSecondary1 is "DECON63"

Allowed Values:
CFS //Clinical Frailty Scale, 
FI //Frailty Index, 
FFC //Fried Frailty Criteria, 
O //Other

Name: DateOfAdmission
Description: Also known as first Rehab session in community

Name: SettingClassification
Rule:
Allowed Values:

AHI //Acute Hospital – Inpatient
AHAHP //Acute Hospital – AHP Outpatient
CHI //Community Hospital - Inpatient
DRC //Day Rehab Centre
SCC //Senior Care Centre
AAH //Active Ageing Hub
PC //Polyclinic
HHSHT //Home Healthcare Services - Home Therapy 
NH //Nursing Home

Name: RelevantMedicalHistory
Example: This patient has good health for past 24 months
Description: For qualified clinician (Doctors) to enter relevant medical history to be passed down to downstream service providers

Name: CaregiverStatusOnAdmission
Rule:
Allowed Values: 

D //Does not need caregiver
NLC //Needs caregiver, live-in caregiver(s) available 
NAC //Needs caregiver, ad-hoc caregiver(s) available 
NNC //Needs caregiver, no available caregiver 
NA //Not applicable

Name: RelationshipOfPrimaryCaregiver
Rule:
[To be provided only if CaregiverStatusOnAdmission is ‘NLC’ or ‘NAC’]

Allowed Values: 
SE //Self 
N //No caregiver 
S //Spouse 
C //Children 
CI//Children-in-law
P//Parent 
SI //Sibling 
GC //Grandchildren 
DH //Domestic helper 
O //Others

Name: Section 3 Start
Description: To indicate the start of Section 3

Name: EQ5D-5L admission form start
Description: To indicate the start of EQ5D-5L admission form

Name: Mobility
Rule:
Allowed values:
1 to 5, 999

[NGEMR Mapping:
No problems = 1, 
Slight problems = 2,
Moderate problems = 3, 
Severe problems = 4, 
Unable to = 5,
NA = 999
]

NGEMR to send 1 to 5, 999

Name: SelfCare
Rule:
Allowed values:
1 to 5, 999

[NGEMR  Mapping:
No problems = 1, 
Slight problems = 2,
Moderate problems = 3, 
Severe problems = 4, 
Unable to = 5
NA = 999
]

NGEMR to send 1 to 5, 999

Name: UsualActivities
Rule:
Allowed values:
1 to 5, 999

[NGEMR Mapping:
No problems = 1, 
Slight problems = 2,
Moderate problems = 3, 
Severe problems = 4, 
Unable to = 5
NA = 999
]
NGEMR to send 1 to 5, 999
Description: Usual Activities (e.g. work, study, housework, family, or leisure activities)

Name: Pain/Discomfort
Rule:
Allowed values:
1 to 5, 999

[NGEMR Mapping:
No problems = 1, 
Slight problems = 2,
Moderate problems = 3, 
Severe problems = 4, 
Unable to = 5
NA = 999
]
NGEMR to send 1 to 5, 999

Name: AnxietyDepression
Rule:
Allowed values:
1 to 5, 999

[NGEMR Mapping:
No problems = 1, 
Slight problems = 2,
Moderate problems = 3, 
Severe problems = 4, 
Unable to = 5
NA = 999
]
NGEMR to send 1 to 5, 999

Name: RateHealth
Description:
On a scale of 0 -100, how would you rate your health TODAY?
(0=worst health, 100=best health)

Name: Please Specify
Rule: If any field is NA/999, this field is mandatory

Description: To indicate the end of EQ5D-5L admission form

Name: FIM admission form start
Description: To indicate the start of FIM admission form

Name: LocomotionType
Rule:
Allowed values:
W //Walk
WH //Wheelchair
B // Both
NA// NA

Name: LocomotionWalk
Rule:
To be provided only if LocomotionType is ‘W’

Allowed values:
1 to 7, 999

Name: LocomotionWheelchair
Rule:
To be provided only if LocomotionType is ‘WH’ 
Allowed values:
1 to 7, 999

Name: LocomotionBoth
Rule:
To be provided only if LocomotionType is ‘B’ 
Allowed values:
1 to 7, 999

Name: ComprehensionCategory
Rule:
Allowed values:
V //Verbal
NV //Non-verbal
BOTH //Both
NA//NA


[NGEMR Auditory is to be mapped to Verbal,
Visual is to be mapped to Non-verbal]

NGEMR to send V, NV or Both, NA

Allowed values:
V //Verbal
NV //Non-verbal
BOTH //Both
NA// NA

Visual is to be mapped to Non-verbal]

NGEMR to send V, NV or BOTH

Name: Please specify: - (Frenchay index)
Rule: If all fields (Frenchay index) is all 999, this field is mandatory

Name: Please specify: - (FOIS)
Rule: If field (FOIS) is 999, this field is mandatory

Name: Gait Speed
Rule:
Allowed values:
0.01 to 99.98,999

Mapped to calculated speed in NGEMR
Description: Gait Speed in m/s (enter 999 if not applicable)

Name: Please specify: - (Gait speed)
Rule: If field (Gait speed) is 999, this field is mandatory

Name: AusTOMsTypes
Rule:
Allowed values (Multiple):
Speech, // Speech
Language, //Language
CognitiveCommunication // Cognitive- Communication
Description:
Australian Therapy Outcome Measures Core Areas

If AUSTOMS is not applicable, the value for AusTOMsTypes field should be “Speech, Language, CognitiveCommunication”

Name: SpeechImpairment
Rule:
To be provided only if AusTOMsType contains ‘S’

Allowed values:
Zero //0 – Profound 
ZeroPointFive //0.5
One //1 – Severe 
OnePointFive //1.5
Two //2 - Moderate/severe
TwoPointFive //2.5
Three //3 - Moderate
ThreePointFive //3.5
Four //4 - Mild
FourPointFive // 4.5
Five //5 – No Speech Impairment
NA
Description:
Speech impairment

If AUSTOMS is not applicable to the patient, this value must be sent as NA

Name: SpeechActivityLimitation
Rule:
To be provided only if AusTOMsType contains ‘S’

Allowed values:
Zero //0 – Profound 
ZeroPointFive //0.5
One //1 – Severe 
OnePointFive //1.5
Two //2 - Moderate/severe
TwoPointFive //2.5
Three //3 - Moderate
ThreePointFive //3.5
Four //4 - Mild
FourPointFive // 4.5
Five //5 – No limitation
NA
Description:
Speech activity limitation

If AUSTOMS is not applicable to the patient, this value must be sent as NA

Name: SpeechParticipationRestriction
Rule:
To be provided only if AusTOMsType contains ‘S’

Allowed values:
Zero //0 – Unable to fulfil social, work, educational or family roles
ZeroPointFive //0.5
One //1 – Severe 
OnePointFive //1.5
Two //2 - Moderate/severe
TwoPointFive //2.5
Three //3 - Moderate
ThreePointFive //3.5
Four //4 - Mild
FourPointFive // 4.5
Five //5 – No Difficulties
NA
Description:
Speech participation restriction

If AUSTOMS is not applicable to the patient, this value must be sent as NA

Four //4 - Mild
FourPointFive // 4.5
Five //5 – Able to cope with most situations
NA
Description:

Name: RehabSettingReferredTo
Rule:
Allowed values (Multiple):

AHI //Acute Hospital - AHP Outpatient
CH //Community Hospital - Inpatient
CBSDRP //Centre Based Services – Day Rehabilitation 
PC //Polyclinic
HHSHT //Home Healthcare Services- Home Therapy 
NFRN //No further rehabilitation needed
OTHERS // Others: Please specify
Description: Rehab settings that the patient is referred to

Name: RehabSettingReferredToOthers
Rule:
[To be provided only if RehabSettingReferredTo is “OTHERS”]

Max 254 characters 
No ‘|’ symbol
Description:
Rehab settings that the patient is referred to 
others reason

Name: CommServicesReferredTo
Rule:
[To be provided only If RehabSettingReferredTo is ‘NFRN’ 

Allowed values (Multiple):
If ‘N//None’ is selected then other values will not be allowed.

N //None
ME //Centre Based Services – Maintenance Exercise
DC //Centre Based Services – Day Care
AAH //Centre Based Services – Active Aging Hub
HPB //Community programs run by Health Promotion Board
AS //Community programs run by ActiveSG
PA //Community programs run by People’s Association
HC //Community programs run by Healthcare Clusters
OTHER //Others: Please specify;

Name: CommServicesReferredToOthers
Rule:
If CommServicesReferredTo option is OTHER’

Max 254 characters
No ‘|’ symbol

Name: FollowRDGPathway
Description: Does this follow the RDG dominant pathway?

Name: IfNoFollowReason
Rule:
[To be provided if FollowRDGPathway is “N”]

Max 254 characters
No ‘|’ symbol

Name: DischargeCriteria
Rule:
Allowed values (Multiple):

IN01 //INPATIENT: Achieved rehab goal, medically fit for discharge and no further transitional care issues that require inpatient care 

IN02 // INPATIENT: No further improvement (functional plateau), medically fit for discharge, and no further transitional care issues that require inpatient care 

IN03 //INPATIENT: Reached maximum RDG-specific rehab LOS, and medically fit for discharge 

[show 4-6 for patients discharged from outpatient setting] 

OUT01 //OUTPATIENT: Achieved rehab goal 

OUT02 // OUTPATIENT: No further improvement (functional plateau) 

OUT03 //OUTPATIENT: Reached RDG-specific maximum sessions or duration 

OUT04 //OUTPATIENT: Developed new RDG, to restart care plan 

AD01 //Stopped / did not show up for rehab / demise

Name: RLOSExceededReasons
Rule:
[This is mandatory only if Rehab Length of Stay exceeds recommended RDG-specific RLOS & DischargeCriteria is not OUT04 or AD01]

Allowed values (Multiple):
PRI //Patient related issues (medical) 
EI //Equipment issues 
SI //Service issues 
SCSI //Social/community support issues 
PB //Patient behavioural/mental health issues 
TI //Transportation issues 
FI //Financial issues 
HI //Housing issues 
O // Other issues. Please specify
Description: Indicate reason(s) for delay [select all that apply]

Name: RLOSExceedReasonsText
Rule:
[To be provided only if RLOSExceedReasons is ‘O’]

Max characters 254

Name: HomeModifications
Rule:
Allowed values:

Yes //Yes, done
YP //Yes, pending
No //No
Description: Does the patient require home modifications?

Name: HomeModificationsDone
Rule:
If HomeModifications option is ‘Yes’ or ‘YP’

Max characters 254
Description: What home modifications were/are being done?

Name: CaregiverStatus
Rule:
[To be provided only if DischargeCriteria is not OUT04 or AD01]

Allowed Values: 

D //Does not need caregiver
NLC //Needs caregiver, live-in caregiver available 
NAC //Needs caregiver, ad-hoc caregiver available 
NNC //Needs caregiver, no available caregiver 
NPA //Needs caregiver, pending arrangements
NA //Not applicable

Name: CaregiverRelationship
Rule:
[To be provided only if CaregiverStatus is either ‘NLC’ or ‘NAC’]

Allowed values:

SP //Spouse/Partner 
PG //Parent/Guardian 
C //Child 
S //Sibling 
F //Foreign domestic worker 
O //Others. Please specify

[
Spouse/Partner (Spouse),
Parent/Guardian (Parent),
Child (Children),
Sibling (Siblings),
Foreign domestic worker (Domestic Helper),
Others (No caregiver/
 Grandchildren, Children in law, Others (comments))
]
Values in bracket are from NGEMR

Name: CaregiverRelationshipOthers
Rule:
[To be provided if CaregiverRelationship is ‘O’]

Max characters 254

[NGEMR to provide ‘No caregiver’ or ‘Grandchildren’ where applicable]

Name: DischargeEmployStatus
Rule:
[For all discharge employment status that does not fall within the allowed values, please specify as ‘O’] 

[To be provided if  is ‘E’& only if DischargeCriteria is not OUT04 or AD01]


Allowed values:

E //Employed
U //Unemployed
SE //Self-employed
H //Homemaker
R //Retiree
O //Others
Description: Discharge employment status or anticipated employment status after discharge

Name: DischargeMobilityComm
Rule:
[This is mandatory only if DischargeCriteria is not OUT04 or AD01]

Allowed values:
WI //Walk independently 
WA //Walk assisted
WID //Walk independently; does not use PMA 
WIIM //Walk independently; independent with PMA
WAD //Walk assisted; does not use PMA 
WAI //Walk assisted; independent with PMA 
WANA //Walk assisted; needs assistance with PMA 
NIP //Not able to walk; independent with PMA 
NAP // Not able to walk; assisted with PMA 
H //Homebound
B //Bedbound
O //Others
Description: Mobility status in community at Discharge

Name: DischargeSocialServices
Rule:
Allowed Values (Multiple):
DC //Day Care 
DDC //Dementia Day Care 
HMS //Home Medical Service 
HNS //Home Nursing Service 
MOW //Meal-on-Wheels 
MET //Medical Escort & Transport 
HPC //Home Personal Care
Description: What social service(s) is/are the patient referred to? [select all that apply]

Name: Section 4 end
Description: To indicate the end of Section 4
